text: Louis Eugene Brus (born August 10, 1943)Profile of Louis Eugene Brus is an American chemist. He is a professor at Columbia University. He is the co- discoverer of the colloidal semi-conductor nanocrystals known as quantum dots. In 2023, he was awarded the Nobel Prize in Chemistry. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American chemists Category:Scientists from Cleveland
title: Louis E. Brus
